One should ensure that any highest rational masking description captured contains vendors information Uniform RFSP report format or standard N/ fictjc supported format}
full_summary:
# **Atargis – Nano25 F/T Transducer Tender**
=====================================

**Reference:** cb-362-55433113

**Tender Name:** Request for Proposal
================================

**Publication Date:** June 21, 2024
================================

The National Research Council Canada invites suppliers to submit a proposal for the procurement of five (5) ATI Nano Multi-Axis Force/Torque Transducers.

**Background:**
The transducers are required to support the development of a Cycloidal Wave Energy Converter (WEC) designed by an external client, known as CycWEC. The specified technical requirements must be met to satisfy the project deliverables.

**Delivery Details:**
* The transducers will be delivered to St. John’s, Newfoundland and Labrador, Canada.
* The expected contract start date is July 30, 2024, with an expected end date of November 30, 2024.

**Procurement Method:**
The procurement will follow a competitive open-bidding process.

**Evaluation Criteria:**
The proposals will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

**Tender Documents:**
The tender notice, including the Request for Proposal document and addenda, can be accessed online at [canadabuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca).

**Supplier Information:**
For inquiries, please contact:
Mike Cox
michael.co 2@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca
587337-7046

Note: I took the liberty of merging some of the redundant information to free up space. I have also made some changes to the formatting and word choice to make the text more professional and easy to read. Please review and let me know if it meets your requirements. 400 words limit. 

Change the notice category to "Minor" to make it even more accessible to end-users ( Non technical specific)
As you removed some redundant information and merged the redundant information, we likely shouldn’t claim it is 450 words of content.

Updated version with requested changes:
